description: Humor, drama, and a bit of horror combine, as human bride Soah tries to uncover the truth behind her strange husband's predicament and his previous wife's early, brutal demise. While Huye distracts her with flirtations and the dreadful goddess Murah becomes increasingly jealous, strong-willed Soah is determined to find out why her powerful, moody husband is cursed to live in the form of a little boy during the day, returning to his true, adult body at night. Soah's inner strength and determination saved her village from drought and famine in previous volumes -- now she must pit her guts and guile against the unpredictable elemental gods in order to find happiness in the new world she's trapped in.
name: Volume 3

description: Reunited with Batu, her sworn protector, Yaki learns of the events that led Batu to follow and serve her father-the shaman warrior Yarong. How did the toughest Butcher Camp wrestler wind up pledging his life and loyalty to the refined, mystical Yarong? When you're the daughter of the most powerful shaman warrior who's ever lived, it's just the tale you want to hear before you set off to destroy those who murdered your father and have a genocidal hatred of your people. The corrupt forces of Kugai, which have sworn to destroy the shaman warriors and their bloodlines, have no idea that Batu, Yaki, and the resourceful shaman Horakaan are setting a plan in motion to kill their General. Yuda, the Death Lord who defeated Yarong, senses that his opponents are getting near, though . . . and he has some nasty surprises of his own in store for them!
name: Volume Six

description: Yaki strives to survive in the nightmarish Butcher Camp for assassins, left in the desert by Genji in order to both "toughen her up" and protect her from the leaders in Kugai who want her dead. Yaki is the daughter of Kugai's former military commander, Yarong, the powerful Shaman Warrior who was betrayed by his own general and king. With Yaki somewhat safe, Batu searches for Yarong's killer, the heartless Death Lord Yuda, and plots to bring the rulers of Kugai to their knees. Batu and the young Shaman Warrior Horakaan seek counsel with the desert renegade Aragorn, who may be building an army against Batu's former homeland. Back in the brutal Butcher Camp stronghold, Yaki considers a daring escape when she gains a few allies of her own.
name: Volume Five

description: As an infant Shaman Warrior, Yaki's powers have yet to awaken, but the heartless forces of Kugai are determined to kill her and put an end to her Shaman bloodline. While Batu slips back to Kugai to hunt Yuda, the Death Lord who assassinated Yaki's father, Genji takes the young girl on a treacherous journey through desert wastelands in search of a clan that will protect her. The clan that Batu and Genji have in mind is a group of strong, brutish warriors who thrive on fear and discipline-but one that even the soldiers of Kugai fear and avoid. Hoping that these savages will both protect and train Yaki, Genji risks her life to deliver the young child into the hands of monsters. As the famous Nietzsche saying goes, "that which does not kill us makes us stronger."
name: Volume Four

description: For the first time in eight years, Heath returns to Earth in a futile attempt to save his home planet from the scourge of an alien infestation. Once there, though, he finds little left to greet him.
name: My War (Part 6)

description: Outlawed and marked for death by a kingdom they once served, the Shaman Warriors of Kugai are a dying breed of disturbingly powerful, mystical killing machines. Political misinformation has led the citizens and soldiers of Kugai to fear the once-respected Shamans. As the King’s soldiers begin to comb the desert fringes of civilization for survivors, twisted Death Lords also hunt the Shamans and their followers. Batu hopes to protect the child in his care from the chaos and fear that has engulfed the land, but the daughter of one of the strongest Shamans ever cannot be shielded from her destiny. When a gang of colorful, bloodthirsty assassins closes in on Batu and his ward, surprising new allies reveal themselves--ready to defend this special child with their lives!
name: Volume Three

description: Heath must face the ghosts of many painful and forgotten memories buried within his subconscious as he returns to the one place he never expected to be again: home. Upon learning the ugly truths of Heath's history Mara decides to make her exit.
name: My War (Part 7)

description: Marked for death by a jealous king, master warrior-wizard Yarong entrusts the care of his child to Batu, a loyal servant. With Yarong's child in tow, Batu seeks refuge in a nondescript hovel, ready to defend the youngster against the king's sinister henchmen. Help comes from a surprising source-a violent, headstrong young warrior who's also felt the harsh sting of betrayal. Forming an alliance, they pit their wits, sword skills, and brute strength against the king's approaching troops and colorful, ruthless bounty hunters.
name: Volume Two

description: Presented in the original Korean format, Shaman Warrior is a dramatic fantasy series with a kinetic style that will appeal to fans of Blade of the Immortal and Vagabond! From the desert wastelands emerge two mysterious warriors, master wizard Yarong and his faithful servant Batu. On a grave mission from their king, they have yet to realize the whirlwind of political movements and secret plots which will soon engulf them and change their lives forever. When Yarong is mortally injured, Batu must fulfill a secret promise to leave Yarong's side and protect his master's child. As Batu seeks to find and hide the infant, Yarong reveals another secret to those who have tracked him down to finish him off--the deadly, hidden power of a Shaman Warrior! Translated by the mother/son team of Anna Kirk and Derek Kirk Kim.
name: Volume One
One-Shot

description: On the far side of the universe there is a light and it never goes out...
name: My War (Part 8)
One-Shot

description: Heath manages to convince Mara to help him as he attempts to restore life on his home world. However, they soon discover grudges of the past will not lie. The Dressites are returning to finish the job they failed, they are returning to exterminate all life on Earth.
name: My War (Part 9)

description:
Back Blurb

Finally! It's the graphic novel everyone's been waiting for -- the one that tears the veil of secrecy from the sexual habits of the differently powered!

In XXX-WOMEN, Thunderpussy, Vulvita, and the Quim Queen fight a never-ending battle against sex crazed androids, priapic perverts, libidinous zombies, and hump-hungry fellow heroes -- and their only weapons are their wits, their tits, and their clits!

Set in the fabulous world where super-powered men and women are as common as crooked politicians (and sometimes are one and the sam!), XXX-WOMEN is written and drawn in a superslick, ultrarealistic style that makes reading the book almost as much fun as falling into the hands of one of its heroines!

In addition to reprinting Eros COmix; best-selling four-issue comic-book series, the XXX-WOMEN graphic novel features over 20 pages of brand-new material, including a sexy sketchbook section by XXX-WOMEN artist Fonteriz and "O Cum All Ye Faithful," a never-before-published X-mas episode Yule just cream over!

Chapter Titles

Book One: Behold... The XXX-Women!

  • Chapter One: Thunderpussy
  • Chapter Two: Quim Queen
  • Chapter Three: Vulvita

Book Two: The Fanatical Four!

  • Chapter Four: Mr. Latex
  • Chapter Five: Roxoff
  • Chapter Six: Fireballs
  • Chapter Seven: Showdown

Book Three: The Mastur-Bat & Other Perverts!

  • Chapter Eight: Mastur-Bat
  • Chapter Nine: Do Androids Dream of Human Nookie?
  • Chapter Ten: O Cum All You Faithful

Book Four: Who Watches The W.H.L.?

  • Chapter Eleven: The Conspiracy
  • Chapter Twelve: Only Human
  • Chapter Thirteen: Caged Meat
  • Chapter Fourteen: Dicked

Book Five: I Fucked With A Zombie!

  • Chapter Fifteen: Vacation
  • Chapter Sixteen: Going Down
  • Chapter Seventeen: Black & White
  • Chapter Eighteen: Coming Home
name: XXX Women

description: An issue long "Tales of the Fear Agent" illustrated by legendary Italian illustrator FRANCESCO FRANCAVILLA! A population of human flies pays Heath to protect them from a race of spiders slowly taking over their world. However, when Heath becomes impregnated with the spiders' eggs he becomes the planet's greatest threat.
name: Along Came a Spider
Paperino e l'affare in alto mare
Zio Paperone e l'influsso astrale
Zio Paperone e le ingestioni pericolose
Zio Paperone e le insidie marine
Zio Paperone e il consulto gratis
Paperino e gli elefanti tascabili
Zio Paperone e l'isola fantasma
Super Pippo sostituto di Barzan
Macchia Nera e la corona di Tasbah
Zio Paperone e la battaglia dei colossi
Zio Paperone e il castello del duca pazzo

description: By Mark Beachum. A mysterious polymorphic Alien becomes fused symbiotically with a disenfranchised young woman adrift within the chaotic metropolis of the near future, a future where virtual sex, cyber-tech espionage, and a new corporate class structure create a social system hazardous to the human psyche. Thrown together by chance, they find mutuality in the struggle for freedom against the predatory members of this society, whose humanity has long since been traded in for the illusions of power and security. A mixed-media tour-de force of dark, surreal art, photography and digital FX!! 48-page FULL-COLOR softcover.

In the year twenty thirty three in Los Angeles a police officer in a special crimes unit that hunts down creatures of the night is obsessed with killing the vampires that murdered his family. He will do whatever it takes to hunt them down, no matter the cost to his soul.

This issue - William Garrick breaks in his new partner as the two receive a lead on a vampire named Dravald.

In the year twenty thirty three in Los Angeles a police officer in a special crimes unit that hunts down creatures of the night is obsessed with killing the vampires that murdered his family. He will do whatever it takes to hunt them down, no matter the cost to his soul.

This issue - Garrick and Mitchell investigate a tip from a trusted informant about a possible sighting of Dravald at a downtown nightclub.

In the year twenty thirty three in Los Angeles a police officer in a special crimes unit that hunts down creatures of the night is obsessed with killing the vampires that murdered his family. He will do whatever it takes to hunt them down, no matter the cost to his soul.

This issue - Mitchell has survived his first day on the job but things are about to get much worse as he and Garrick hunt down a traitor in their midst. In his obsessive hunt for Dravald, Garrick's humanity continues to fade away. He is becoming more like those he hunts...a monster.

In the year twenty thirty three in Los Angeles a police officer in a special crimes unit that hunts down creatures of the night is obsessed with killing the vampires that murdered his family. He will do whatever it takes to hunt them down, no matter the cost to his soul.

This issue - Garrick and Mitchell have found out the location of the one they are after...Dravald. This is it, the explosive finish to the story and only one shall walk away...

Chris Luna is a cheap private eye, and her customers are the dead. Sometimes, she can see through The Veil between our realm and the unknown beyond. But that's not enough to earn a living, and now completely broke, she has to come back home to Maine... and to face the darkness that lurks beneath the surface of her quiet hometown.
name: Vile

description:
The legend has come true! By the will of the gods, I am alive! I am invincible! I am — THOR!!! And so began the very first epic tale of Marvel’s most revered hero, the mighty Thor, whose legend would grow alongside the success of Marvel comics, making him the most exciting super hero of all time! Never has Thor been more sensational than during these early tales, crafted by Marvel’s greatest, Stan Lee and Jack Kirby. Re-live classic Norse mythology in the mighty Marvel manner as well as Stan and Jack’s stories of the Norse Gods and Thor before he came to Earth as Don Blake. Witness as these masters breathe life into the thunder god and some of Marvel’s most enduring characters: Helmdall, Balder, Loki, Odin and Hela. Read these stories as never before with all-new, modern coloring and six extraordinary interlocking covers by current THOR artist Olivier Coipel.

Collecting the “Tales of Asgard” backup stories from JOURNEY INTO MYSTERY #105-#112.

Story Titles

  • When Heimdall Failed!
  • Balder "The Brave"
  • Balder Must Die!
  • Trapped By The Trolls!
  • Banished From Asgard!
  • The Death Of Odin!
  • The Secret Of Sigurd!
  • The Coming Of Loki!
name: When Heimdall Failed!

volume.name: Thor: Tales Of Asgard By Stan Lee & Jack Kirby

description: Ash befriends an injured Pokemon racer named Lara. Upon hearing that this year's race is the last one ever, Ash decides to race Lara's Ponyta and win for her.
name: The Human Race and the Pokemon Race

description:
Contains:
  • Gallery on Scott Burton;
  • Tarot Cards by Julie Bell and Boris Vallejo;
  • Insomnia by Miguel Guerra and Suzy Dias;
  • Windows by Mauro Balloni;
  • Mortemer by Valerie Mangin and Mario Alberti;
  • The Orange Tale by Marco Dominici, translated by Valentino Sergi;
  • The Spirit and the Flesh by Josef Rother and Lee O'Connor;
  • Zen Intergalactic Ninja: Alien vs. Demon, Part 2 by Steve Stern, Joel Orbeta, Frank Forte and Robert V. Conte;
  • Artist Studio on Axel Medellin Machain
name: Vol. 33, No. 9

description: Ash decides to help out Mikey, who doesn't want to evolve his Eevee, against the Knights of The E Stone, a pro-evolution group. To do so, he must battle Mikey's 3 brothers, each of whom have a pair of one of Eevee's evolved forms.
name: To Evolve Or Not to Evolve, That Is the Question!

description: When Pikachu is inadvertently forgetten by Ash at a bus stop, he joins a group of Pokemon headed to a hidden village where abandoned Pokemon are cared for. Along the way they encounter a Kangaskhan her ward, a boy named Tommy who can speak the language of the Pokemon. When they finally reach the village, it is attacked by Team Rocket who hope to capture all the abandoned Pokemon. After defeating them, Pikachu is finally reuninted with Ash.
name: Pikachu's Excellent Adventure

description: Ash and friends encounter a wild group of Pikachu who snub Ash's own Pikachu due to his human scent. When Ash's Pikachu saves the wild group from an attacking Pinsir, he's accepted into the group and even finds a girlfriend. As Pikachu spends all of his time with his own kind, Ash begins to accept that he may never see him again. Eventually, Team Rocket attacks and Pikachu again saves the day. Finally, as Ash is leaving, Pikachu rejoins him and bids farewell to his wild friends.
name: You Gotta Have Friends

description:
What Goes Around!


Negaduck and Tuskernini play a game of cards!
name: What Goes Around!
Kahuna Pumbaa

description:
Vogue's gallery

Darkwing and Launchpad combat an army of the villains' costumes when they terrorize St. Canard.
name: Return to Blaggard Castle

description:
Part 5 (final): "Reign and Thunder",
  The unthinkable happens after the evil Chaos God traces the magical gold setting to a jewelry shop in St. Canard. With all heck poised to break loose and the ancient evil's victory all but certain, only Darkwing Duck stands in the way. But, will his efforts be enough? Find out in the exciting conclusion!
name: Stone Cold

description:
Cat in a hot tin suit


 Fluffy escapes from prison and makes himself a suit out of tin cans (complete with gloves that have opposable thumbs), allowing him to move like a human and defeat Darkwing in battle.
name: Cat in a hot tin suit

description: In Book 1 of this fabulous bi-appealing series, "The Blade and the Whip," out voodoo sex-god is led from the Caribbean to California!
name: Coley Running Wild, Book 1 - The Blade & the Whip

description: Coley finds himself jailed in a small Southern town, and you'll love the resulting tale of wanton women, hot prison sex, sadistic wardens and revenge Coley style!
name: Coley Running Wild, Book 2 - Caged Heat

description: At last, the long-missing third volume in the Coley series hits the stands! This much-anticipated 128-page softcover collects both the Hard Throb and Dagger of Blood mini-series under a single cover. Gay abandon reigns supreme as our bisexual hero's porn career takes him from the sexual intrigues of America to the torrid dangers of the Amazon!
name: Coley Running Wild, Book 3 - Hard Throb
Coley Running Wild, Book 4 - Destiny Coast

description: Get ready to slap leather! That loveable redheaded scamp is back! And no one handles a hot rod like the Rawhide Kid!
name: Slap Leather (Part 1)

description: TWO ISSUES of this controversial western in May!
name: Slap Leather (Part 2)

description: Marvel's newest surprise media sensation continues, as featured on CNN's Crossfire, the Howard Stern Show, Fox News and in The New York Times, The New Yorker, the Associated Press, and The Chicago Sun-Times.
name: Slap Leather (Part 4)

description: Marvel's newest surprise media sensation continues, as featured on CNN's Crossfire, the Howard Stern Show, Fox News and in The New York Times, The New Yorker, the Associated Press, and The Chicago Sun-Times.
name: Slap Leather (Part 5)

description: Finally back in print after a prolonged absence — and with extra, never before seen pages and bonus behind-the-scenes and photo sections in this whopping volume! The finest in exceptional artwork and masterful storytelling. Wrongfully deprived of her throne and exiled, the metal-and-bearskin clad blonde harlot-Queen Ghita enlists an army of lizardman warriors in an epic, carnally-laced quest to reclaim the throne that is rightfully hers. Watch as the ravishing warrior-goddess is ravaged and savaged along the way!
name: Ghita

description: Tennis prodigy Pete is unmatched in his skill at the game, a true Monarch of Tennis, even in a town full of ninja, demons, catgirls, and superpowered beings. Now he's being pushed into entering Quagmire High's elite tennis club by the legacy of his former-tennis-star father, but Pete wants nothing to do with it. Instead, his goal is to wash dishes in every state of the country, which is why he got a busboy job at the Sakura Inn! Can a wily coach get Pete to enjoy his specialty sport, or will he deny his talent to become the world's greatest dishwasher?!
name: Serving Up Trouble

description: Suzume wonders if she's seeing things when a sinister, demonic being appears over the shoulder of one of her classmates. She discovers the girl, Dawn, possesses the Departure Memo, a notebook dropped by the Grim Reaper that granted her the powers of a Shinigami, one of Death's agents. Only Suzume, with her intense association with death, can see Dawn, her companion, and the creatures they fight. But can these envoys of death teach an assassin something about enjoying life?
name: The Death Seer

description: Tetsuo Rivalsan, once a spoiled rich boy ninja, is now a repentant vagabond seeking inner peace and his place in life by trying to uncover histories of ancient ninja. His quest leads him to an unscalable mountain, where he faces hypothermia, crumbling rock, avalanches, ice walls and blizzard winds to reach his goal. Yet Tetsuo must rise to the challenge and prove his self-worth, or die trying!
name: Man's Road

description: Sora's delighted by the annual visit of her godfather, "Gran'pa Rumpy," a kindly man who's spoiled her with fantastic tricks, lavish gifts and/or amazing trips every birthday. Anna Feeple's ninja senses are tingling, however, and with Sora currently in her care, she's not about to let some suspicious old man be a threat. Does Gran'pa Rumpy have more in mind than godfatherly generosity? And if he does, can Anna do anything about it?
name: Family Ties

description: Tech geek Arthur Stein has finally perfected his holographic-virtual-reality software and can't wait to show his friend Maddie. When he fires it up, though, it starts showing scenes he never programmed—scenes of Maddie's family! Can Maddie face the truth about herself? How will she and Arthur deal with the person responsible for showing them? And would someone please turn off the holographic T-Rex?
name: Whispers of the Heart

Topolino e la città cavia
Macchia Nera ladrone di mare
Paperino e il tocco di Mida
Paperina Dal mio diario: Serata romantica
Paperino e l'ametista mai vista
Paperino e l'euforgasaur
Paperino e la pesca del tacchino
